availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander H. Dudley (Lyon County, Kentucky, court clerk)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, merchant and county clerk. Kentucky native. Married Susan Dudley. Father of Robert Dudley, Benjamin Dudley, George A. Dudley, Frances "Fanny" A. Dudley, and Anna Bell Dudley. Married to Maria E. Jenkins Dudley on September 11, 1856. Father of Walter Dudley. Commercial merchant in Hickman, Kentucky, in 1850. Delegate from Lyon County to the 1860 Democratic National Convention. Clerk of the Lyon County Court from 1858 to 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, Hickman, p. 224A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 761.
Jordan Dodd, Kentucky Marriages, 1802-1850, Ancestry, Caldwell County, Kentucky, September 11, 1856.
The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), December 10. 1859.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861,” in 1862 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Thomas S. Dalton, State Printer, 1860), 292.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861,” in 1862 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862), 303-308.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1862,” in 1863 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 24. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1863), 298-306.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1863,” in 1864 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 10. (Frankfort, Ky.: Wm. E. Hughes, State Printer, 1864), 301-306.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1864,” in 1865 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: George D. Prentice, State Printer, 1865), 9-12.
Administrator’s and Executor’s Bond Books, 1854-1978, Ancestry, Lyon County, Administrator’s Bond, June 1864. KYR-0001-029-0096; KYR-0001-029-0548.
